name: Blood Hawks
description:
Bring death from above and crush the evil buzzard horde!

UPDATE: (12/29/2019)
A FREE playable demo is live, the game is still in DEEP DEVELOPMENT -- this is just a taste!

Planned features:

- Magic powers!
- More Mount Variety!
- 100 Stages Planned!
- 10 Boss encounters!
- Different Enemy Types!
- 2 Player Local Drop-In Co-Op!

*Note this demo is FREE, however the final product is intended to cost between $1-$5 to cover the cost of development ( I'm one guy )*

---------------------------
Description:

Take to the skies as you fight back the swarming buzzard army in this modern take on the classic arcade formula. Based on the retro titles "Joust" and "Joust II", control the warrior as they mount up a variety of different creatures to take on the enemy mounts in this action packed adventure!

Local 2 player co-op is planned, and the game currently supports both keyboard and Xbox controller inputs.

Be sure to follow the game to get up to the moment updates and behind the scenes development content!
